mapper.select: SELECT c.*, a.STATE AS ACCOUNT_STATE, d.ID as CURRENCY_ID, d.CODE as CURRENCY_CODE, d.NAME as CURRENCY_NAME, d.RANK as CURRENCY_RANK FROM KSA_FINANCE_CHARGE c LEFT JOIN KSA_BD_DATA d ON d.ID = c.CURRENCY_ID LEFT JOIN KSA_FINANCE_ACCOUNT a ON a.ID = c.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE c.BOOKINGNOTE_ID = #{id}
